channel.title: Dont try to run 10 aryans at same time and play Warcraft 3 xD
channel.description:
Lol well, i just made 10 accounts, started them all on tutIsland, then minimised them all.
all was going fine...
I opened up wc3 and got into a game, then BOOM i lagged out, my connection dropped, and my computer froze.
I closed wc3 (took 2 minutes to do that) then worked on closing the aryans till finally my video card just decided to stop working x.D
Restarted, all is good =P
I'll go back to 3 aryans with wc3 lol
(a month ago i could run 15 aryans while sleeping, no problems (this is without wc3 running))
~Angelo
